mapper.select: SELECT eps_role.id AS id, eps_role.role_name AS role_name, eps_role.role_desc AS role_desc, eps_role.is_deleted AS is_deleted, eps_role.gmt_create AS gmt_create, eps_role.gmt_modified AS gmt_modified FROM electricity_prediction.eps_user_role_relation AS eps_user_role_relation LEFT JOIN electricity_prediction.eps_role AS eps_role ON eps_user_role_relation.role_id = eps_role.id WHERE user_id = #{userId}
